exam.question: It is our ______ policy that we will achieve unity through peaceful means.

answer.explain: 句意： 通过和平方式获得统一是我们一贯的政策。continuous: 连续不断的； considerate： 考虑周到的； continual： 连续的。

sentences.sContent: She’s the team’s most consistent player.
sentences.sCn: 她是该队中表现最为稳定的选手。

sentences.sContent: ...Jobs' career can be viewed as a consistent pursuit of improving those odds...
...networking is less about career-building relationships than a consistent search for new ideas...
...disappointment and jealousy-are fairly consistent across cultures...

synos.tran: 始终如一的，[数]一致的；坚持的

remMethod.val: consist(一致) ＋ ent(…的) → 一致的

trans.tranCn: 坚持的， 一贯的； 一致的， 符合的
trans.tranOther: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval
